name: Extra Panache

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature.

sections.text: You gain two more panache points at the start of each day, and your maximum panache increases by two.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: If you have levels in the swashbuckler class, you can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, these benefits increase by two.
sections.name: Special

prerequisites: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature
description: You have more panache than the ordinary swashbuckler.
